mapper.select: SELECT c_code, c_name, c_des, c_bcode, c_local, c_id, c_chat, c_banner ,c_count, c_state, c_rdate, b_name, b_bookcover FROM book JOIN community ON book.b_code = community.c_bcode ORDER BY c_code DESC

select AA.* FROM( select @RNO := @RNO + 1 as r, CC.* FROM( SELECT c_code, c_name, c_des, c_bcode, c_local, c_id, c_chat, c_banner ,c_count, c_state, c_rdate, b_name, b_bookcover FROM book JOIN community ON book.b_code = community.c_bcode ORDER BY c_code DESC ) CC, (SELECT @RNO := 0) BB ORDER BY c_code DESC ) AA WHERE r BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} ORDER BY c_code DESC

SELECT c_code, c_name, c_des, c_bcode, c_local, c_id, c_chat, c_banner ,c_count, c_state, c_rdate, b_name, b_bookcover FROM book JOIN community ON book.b_code = community.c_bcode WHERE c_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') || b_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT c_code, c_name, c_des, c_bcode, c_local, c_id, c_chat, c_banner ,c_count, c_state, c_rdate, b_name, b_bookcover FROM book JOIN community ON book.b_code = community.c_bcode ORDER BY c_rdate DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT c_code, c_name, c_des, c_bcode, c_local, c_id, c_chat, c_banner ,c_count, c_state, c_rdate, b_name, b_bookcover, m_nick FROM book JOIN community ON book.b_code = community.c_bcode JOIN member ON community.c_id = member.m_id WHERE c_code = #{c_code}
SELECT lib_id, b_code, b_name, b_bookcover, lib_proc FROM mylib JOIN book ON mylib.lib_bcode = book.b_code WHERE lib_id = #{loginID} and lib_proc >= 0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community (c_code, c_name, c_des, c_bcode, c_local, c_id, c_chat, c_banner ,c_count) VALUES (#{c_code}, #{c_name}, #{c_des}, #{c_bcode}, #{c_local}, #{c_id}, #{c_chat}, #{c_banner}, #{c_count})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CAST(substr(c_code, 4, 6) AS INT)) FROM community
